name: OTP Bank
overview: OTP Bank Plc. provides commercial banking services. The Bank has operations in Hungary, Bulgaria, Slovakia, Romania, Croatia, Serbia, Ukraine, Russia, and Montenegro. It operates through a network of 1,601 branches. Loan Portfolio The Bankâ€™s loan portfolio includes corporate loans, retail loans, housing loans, and municipality loans. Deposits The Bank offers various deposits, including retail deposits, corporate deposits, and municipality deposits. Investment Portfolio The Bankâ€™s investment portfolio includes government securities, bonds issued by the National Bank of Hungary; mortgage bonds; Hungarian government discounted Treasury bills; and other securities. Dispositions In September 2008, the company sold its insurance business line. History OTP Bank Plc. was founded in 1949.
